::: {.cell}

:::

::: {.cell}

:::


The current valid map is identified by **Map code and version**: F1.4.web.map v1.0.


> Freshwater ecoregions (Abell et al. 2008) were identified as containing occurrences of these functional groups if: i) their descriptions mentioned features consistent with those identified in the profile of the Ecosystem Functional Group; and ii) if their location was consistent with the ecological drivers described in the profile. Within the selected ecoregions, major occurrences were mapped using 1st-4th order streams (3km buffer) taken from the RiverATLAS (v1.0) database (Linke et al. 2019). The remaining areas of selected ecoregions were mapped as minor occurrences..

::: {.cell}

:::


You can download and use this file from the following sources:

- Mapbox tileset ([GeoTIFF version uploaded to Mapbox](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.F1_4_web_map))
 - Zenodo repository (EFG map) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG files](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090968))
 - Zenodo repository (bundle of maps) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG versions in compressed file](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419))

::: {.cell}

:::

This section provides information about the valid indicative distribution map for the ecosystem functional group [**F1.4 Seasonal upland streams**](/efg-info/F1_4.qmd).


::: {.cell}

:::

## Available maps

These maps are considered current and valid indicative distribution maps for this ecosystem functional group.

- Indicative Map (**code: F1.4.IM.grid**, version v2.0) 
 - Web navigation (**code: F1.4.web.map**, version v1.0) 

## Map files

You can download geospatial data for this map from the following sources:

F1.4.IM.grid (v2.0){target="gisdata"}: [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/F1.4.IM.grid_v2.0.tif) :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958934)
F1.4.web.map (v1.0){target="gisdata"}: [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/F1.4.web.map_v1.0.tif) :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419) :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090968) :: [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.F1_4_web_map) :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/)

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.
